properties.query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by scStatus
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure count() by scStatus // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
